coreAttributes.name: Vile Serum
coreAttributes.description: A small glass vial filled with what appears to be some kind of blood-red liquid. The front shows a greater raptor-futa fucking a raptor-girl's maw while drinking from a vial just like this one. Some of the concoction spills off her chin and onto her cock in process.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A powerful wave of pure, primal energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)]
